attributes.action: Change the law for knife crime
attributes.additional_details: Knife crime in the UK is out of control and the government are doing nothing about it. Too many people are being killed by knives. If the government changed the law by giving higher sentences then there will be a change
attributes.background: Give a higher sentence for carrying bladed weapons and a higher sentence for killing with a bladed weapon

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633328
